name: Vibrant Blobs
description:
Game about clicking on colorful blobs (circles) with different difficulties.

Well... You click on circles, that's it. Btw you can change difficulty, if you want to.

This game was made for "Trijam - 155" game jam, it was my fifth Game Jam. The theme was "Gameplay under 1 minute". I hope you will like this game.

Everything in the game is created by me in limit of 3 hours.

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
